Articles.Content:
Hullo.

I'm looking for large cargo bays, larger than the CRG-8. The CRG-8 seems to be able to fit "medium" size stuff, like the FL-T series size parts, but with absolutely no clearance for sticking-out bits like RCS thrusters. Has anyone made anything larger?

If at all possible I'd actually like to fit the next size up as well, like the large Rockomax fuel tanks, hitchhiker storage container etc.

B9 has plenty

Thanks. Far more parts than I want, but I guess I can always delete the ones I don't need.
I'll be getting around to larger cargo bays eventually as well with RF. but no ETA yet.
I use the Honeybadger cargo bays out of the USI FTT pack. They're size 3 and fit size 2 stuff with more things mounted radially quite well.
